name: Those Days
storyline: it is about a guy that decides that he will be spending a few days in his family's farmhouse. There he meets family friends called Cott, Salmi, and later on a few other characters that will make his vacation a bit more interesting.
summary: Those Days is a casual gay adult visual novel about a guy who decides to spend a few days in his family's farmhouse. There he meets Cott, Salmi, and later on, a few other characters that will make his vacation a bit more interesting.
